description: Merge an orphan material site into a surviving material site.
permissions: User must be an admin to create a material site merger.
side_effects: Reassigns references from the orphan material site to the survivor in jobs, job start sites, job schedule shift start sites, and trips; merges the orphan's supply and dump material types into the survivor; destroys the orphan material site.
validation_notes: --orphan and --survivor are required. Orphan and survivor material sites must belong to the same broker.

flags.name: --orphan
flags.validation: Required. Must be a material site ID.

flags.name: --survivor
flags.validation: Required. Must be a material site ID.
